enb_long_title: Twenty-eighth Sessions of the UNFCCC Subsidiary Bodies, Second Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Convention, and fifth Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Kyoto Protocol
sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2008/L.6) the SBI urges parties to make voluntary contributions to the budget to help cover the shortfall and requests the Executive Secretary to take into consideration ways to minimize the effects of exchange rate fluctuations when considering the next budget.
